metadata.title: Center for Development and Leadership - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

content_blocks.text: Career and Leadership
The Center for Leadership Development (CDL) is responsible for the professional development of students from the first year of their degree.
content_blocks.subsection: The Center for Leadership Development (CDL) is responsible for the professional development of students from the first year of their degree.

content_blocks.text: What is the CDL?

Contributing to the training of leaders capable of connecting knowledge from different areas, navigating complex logics, working collaboratively and creatively, aware of their strengths and opportunities for development.
To this end, the CDL is working on two strategic fronts:
content_blocks.subsection: To this end, the CDL is working on two strategic fronts:

content_blocks.text:
To this end, the CDL is working on two strategic fronts:

- Personal and professional development
- Student Community Well-being and Learning
content_blocks.subsection: To this end, the CDL is working on two strategic fronts:

content_blocks.text: Our career vision:

Here at Inteli you will receive all the support you need to experience this transformative journey. During your four-year degree, you will learn to recognize your talents and put them to work transforming the country through technology, generating contribution and impact for the world.
Recognize your own profile
Personality, values and skills.
Identify your wishes for the future
content_blocks.subsection: Identify your wishes for the future

content_blocks.text: Dreams, interests and goals.
Mapping opportunities
Vision of the job market.
CDL in Action
Vacation Internships

Here at Inteli, students have the opportunity to experience their first professional experience from their first year, in a vacation internship. The range of partners is diverse and renewed every semester. Check out some of the companies offering vacancies to our students:
Career and Networking
Our Career Fair is designed precisely to promote strategic actions focused on networking, professional development and workshops to accelerate the start of your career.

Our Career Fair is designed precisely to promote strategic actions focused on networking, professional development and workshops to accelerate the start of your career.

- One-to-one talks and development workshops with some of Brazil's biggest technology companies.
- Contact with leading professionals from corporate, academic or entrepreneurial careers to inspire students on different paths.
Personalized services
The Career Development Program takes place throughout the student's journey.
Students receive personalized feedback on the selection process. From there, they build an individual development plan based on their initial perceptions of their arrival at university life.
Here begins the reflection on values and important points to consider when looking for an internship. Support for finding mentors and creating deep connections in the job market.
Support for learning to work continuously and with a design mindset for continuous professional development.
of third-year students have already started exploring opportunities within the academic, corporate and entrepreneurial tracks
content_blocks.subsection: of third-year students have already started exploring opportunities within the academic, corporate and entrepreneurial tracks
